description: New inmates in prison are often naive in believing that they would be OK. Watch current inmate Josh Peters be interviewed and share what really goes on inside prison. No one bothered him at first but that changes quickly when Adam Bryant notices that hunky piece of meat in the shower. Soon enough Josh is on his knees deep throating Adam’s inmate dick, but it doesn’t end there. He’s taking Adam's big cock hard up his ass in no time!
title: A Guide To Sex In Prison Part 2
